item.description:
Please note the location change for this event- we will be meeting at the Aegean Restaurant in Framingham, NOT John Harvard's as originally scheduled (they are unable to accommodate our group).


Join us for dinner and drinks at the Aegean Restaurant in Framingham. It has been a great two years for our group, and on this night, we will be celebrating all the wonderful friendships and connections that have been formed in our group over the past 2 years.

If you are new to our group or haven't been in a while, be sure to join us for a fun evening. Relax, enjoy some good food and drinks and have fun meeting friendly and interesting people.

Everyone pays for their own food/drink. If you have trouble finding us, please call Catherine at 774 232 0000.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) near hostess area. If you have trouble finding us, please call 774 232 0000
item.name: LOCATION CHANGE: Dinner and Celebration of Our Meet Up Group's 2nd Anniversary!
